arm_group.description: Patients who were operated of pterygium

brief_summary.textblock:
A study to research the post-operative results according to the chosen surgical technique
      and evaluate the refractive changes before and after the excision of pterygium.

clinical_study.brief_title: Different Surgical Techniques for Pterygium Surgery

detailed_description.textblock:
To analyze the epidemiological profile of patients who were operated of pterygium in Eyes
      Institute of Goiânia, analyze the post-operative results according to the chosen surgical
      technique and evaluate the refractive changes before and after the excision of pterygium.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Patients who were underwent the pterygium surgery during the period between from
             February 2013 to August 2013

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Patients with mature cataract

study_pop.textblock: Individuals who were underwent pterygium surgery

clinical_study.official_title: Epidemiological Profile and Comparison Between Different Surgical Techniques for Pterygium Surgery

other_outcome.description: To analyze the post-operative results according to the chosen surgical technique and evaluate the refractive changes before and after the excision of pterygium
other_outcome.measure: Comparison between different surgical techniques for pterygium surgery

primary_outcome.description: Refractive before the excision of pterygium

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description: Refractive after the excision of pterygium

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Case-Only, Time Perspective: Cross-Sectional
